jobDescription: ***FOR IMMEDIATE CONSIDERATION: email Valerie Nielsen at Valerie.Nielsen@rht.com with your resume with Data Analyst*** nbsp; The Position: Data Analyst - SQL Location: West Los Angeles  Target salary: 75,000 with amazing healthcare benefits  Please note: this is a direct hire (not contract) Data Analyst You can do it all. You're a tech savvy Data Analyst that can roll up your sleeves and are a guru in SQL You walk a client rsquo;s walk, and you talk their talk. You understand their concerns better than they do and use them to intuitively identify the highly complex requirements of each project. Your steady hand on the pulse of the client's needs influences functional design, process design, testing, as well as training and supporting implementation teams. You seamlessly transition between the business world and the development team and are integral in creating the product that exceeds expectations.  nbsp;
